## Education and Health

::: {.align-center}
Education and Health are basic [objectives of development]{.hp}
:::

::: {.incremental}
- A [healthy and educated]{.hi} is desirable for growth 
- Modern economies tend to produce healthy and educated inviduals
:::

::: {.incremental}
- Further, we can think of [education and health]{.hi} as [investments]{.hp}
- You [invest]{.hp} in a university degree because it will [pay off eventually]{.h}
- You [invest]{.hp} in eating healthy beacuse it will [pay off eventually]{.h}
- In developing countries, these investments can have [large pay-offs]{.h}
- But these pay-offs happen [in the future]{.hi}
:::

::: {.notes}
The rate of return to schooling equates the value of lifetime earnings of the individual to the net
present value of costs of education
:::
